tags.name: elmsln-studio

  * `route` {`string`} - 

  * `params` - 

  * `query` - 

  * `data` - 

  * `demo-mode` {`boolean`} - 

Properties:

  * `assignments` - 

  * `assignmentsSource` {`string`} - 

  * `discussion` -

  * `lessons` -

  * `portfolios` -

  * `submissions` - 

  * `submissionsSource` {`string`} - 

  * `users` - 

  * `usersSource` {`string`} - 

  * `assignment` - 

  * `lesson` - 

  * `project` - 

  * `feedbackPercentile` - 

  * `recentDiscussions` - 

  * `filteredPortfolios` - 

  * `recentSubmissions` - 

  * `completedSubmissions` {`any[] | undefined`} - 

  * `peerSubmissions` {`any[] | undefined`} - given a student submission gets peer submissions

  * `prevNextSubmission` {`{ prev: any; next: any; } | undefined`} - gets the previous and next submission data for a given submission

  * `submission` - 

  * `portfolio` - 

  * `submissionFeedback` {`any[] | undefined`} - 

  * `route` {`string`} - 

  * `params` -

where "top" contains config for toolbar above image(s),
and "bottom" contains config for toolbar above image(s)

  * `demoMode` {`boolean`} -

tags.name: elmsln-studio-portfolio
tags.description:
`elmsln-studio-portfolio`
Studio App for ELMS:LN

Events:

  * `submit-data` {`CustomEvent<{ type: any; data: any; }>`} - 

  * `fetch-data` {`CustomEvent<{ type: any; refresh: boolean; }>`} - Fires when button is clicked

  * `link-button-click` {`CustomEvent<string>`} - Fires when button is clicked

Attributes:

  * `portfolio` - all submissions that match a specified student id and project id

  * `navigation` - gets submission previous next navigation

  * `submission-filter` {`string`} - submission id to select submission and filter feedback

  * `sort-latest` {`boolean`} - sort submissions latest first instead of oldest first

  * `feedback` - all feedback on submissions that match a specified student id and project id

  * `comment` {`string`} - comment id

  * `demo-mode` {`boolean`} - 

Properties:

  * `portfolio` - all submissions that match a specified student id and project id

  * `navigation` - gets submission previous next navigation

  * `submissionFilter` {`string`} - submission id to select submission and filter feedback

  * `sortLatest` {`boolean`} - sort submissions latest first instead of oldest first

  * `nav` {`TemplateResult<1> | undefined`} - 

  * `sortedSubmissions` {`any[]`} - 

  * `assignment` - 

  * `feedback` - all feedback on submissions that match a specified student id and project id

  * `comment` {`string`} - comment id

  * `defaultModalToolbars` - default toolbar config object,
where "top" contains config for toolbar above image(s),
and "bottom" contains config for toolbar above image(s)

  * `demoMode` {`boolean`} -

tags.name: elmsln-studio-submissions
tags.description:
`elmsln-studio-submissions`
Studio App for ELMS:LN

Events:

  * `submit-data` {`CustomEvent<{ type: any; data: any; }>`} - 

  * `fetch-data` {`CustomEvent<{ type: any; refresh: boolean; }>`} - Fires when button is clicked

  * `link-button-click` {`CustomEvent<string>`} - Fires when button is clicked

Attributes:

  * `assignment-filter` {`string`} - assignment id to filter by assignment

  * `comments` {`any[]`} - select all comments

  * `project-filter` {`string`} - project id to filter by project

  * `student-filter` {`string`} - student id to filter by student

  * `submissions` {`any[]`} - select all submissions

  * `list` {`boolean`} - display submissions as list instead of grid

  * `comment-load` {`number`} - number of comments that will be rendered

  * `demo-mode` {`boolean`} - 

Properties:

  * `assignmentFilter` {`string`} - assignment id to filter by assignment

  * `comments` {`any[]`} - select all comments

  * `projectFilter` {`string`} - project id to filter by project

  * `studentFilter` {`string`} - student id to filter by student

  * `submissions` {`any[]`} - select all submissions

  * `filteredComments` - 

  * `isFiltered` {`boolean`} - 

  * `studentOptions` {`{ "": string; }`} - 

  * `assignmentOptions` {`{ "": string; }`} - 

  * `projectOptions` {`{ "": string; }`} - 

  * `filteredSubmissions` - 

  * `modalTitle` {`string`} - 

  * `list` {`boolean`} - display submissions as list instead of grid

  * `commentLoad` {`number`} - number of comments that will be rendered

  * `defaultModalToolbars` - default toolbar config object,
where "top" contains config for toolbar above image(s),
and "bottom" contains config for toolbar above image(s)

  * `demoMode` {`boolean`} -
